name: Boy Agimat Adventures
description:
Hello, feedbacks are greatly appreciated :)

This game can be played in WebGL or Windows.

For Mac/Linux users:

• Play the game in WebGL. The game takes a few minutes to load for the first time.

NOTE: Launch the game in Incognito Mode to avoid issues, WebGL is sometimes buggy in some cases.

For Windows users:

 • You can play the game on either platform but I would STRONGLY RECOMMEND launching the game on Windows (EXE or ZIP file format)  because the game is much more optimized there.

Download the game installer or zip file below ↓↓↓

If Google Chrome blocks the downloaded installer, just "keep" the file. Google Chrome is heavily secured and blocks unknown installers like these.

THANK YOU AND HAPPY GAMING!!!

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

Developed by: BG Ochave

Boy Agimat Adventures is a Megaman-style fan-made game project.

This game is made for fun and learning purposes only and NOT for monetization.

Made in Unity Version 2019.4.17f1

Used and borrowed assets from other Megaman fan games and all related Megaman content
